FuncDef:
The block start-vlan any qinq command set the range of VLANs from which users are blocked from going online.
The undo block start-vlan any qinq command cancel the blocking configuration.
By default, users in any VLAN are allowed to go online.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the start VLAN ID of QinQ users to be blocked.
The value is in the range of 1 to 4094.

Specifies the end VLAN ID of QinQ users to be blocked.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4094. The end-qinq-vlan value must be greater than or equal to the start-qinq-vlan value.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
You can run this command in the interface view to set the interface status to blocked. Then, all the users who go online from this interface with a specified VLAN ID are prohibited from access.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
